titles.title: Micro Offering Safe Harbor Act
Micro Offering Safe Harbor Act
To amend the Securities Act of 1933 to exempt certain micro-offerings from the registration requirements of such Act, and for other purposes.
Micro Offering Safe Harbor Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 342 - 6.

bill.summary:
Micro Offering Safe Harbor Act
This bill amends the Securities Act of 1933 to exempt certain micro-offerings from: (1) state regulation of securities offerings, and (2) federal prohibitions related to interstate solicitation.
